name: Ant War Simulator - Ant Survival Game
name_original: Ant War Simulator - Ant Survival Game
description:
In this game you control a colony of ants, you must make them hunt, collect food, raise new ants, defend and attack other colonies, survive the rain and the dangers of day and night.

Features:
- 3 species of ants: Red Ants, Giant Black Ants and Mutant Ants.
- Each species of ant has an unique playability style.
- Hostile enemies: Cockroach, Beetle, Ladybug and Spiders!.
- Different maps.
- Save system.
- Beautiful graphics and animations.
- Up to 4 colonies on the same map.
- Customizable game settings.
- Red ants with up to 6 queens.
- Giant black ants with acid.
- Mutant ants can produce and control black widows!
- Campaign (Coming soon).
- Sandbox.
- Tutorial.
